issue.title: Support CMake 2.8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-73](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-73). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we use get_filename_component( .. DIRECTORY ) which is a CMake>2.8 feature. Replacing it with PATH will add support for older CMake versions.

Note: That is enough to build Apache Arrow C++ on Debian Wheezy.
